    Exotic pets
    
Raccoons and dogs are not the only hosts of Baylisascaris. B. procyonis infection has also been documented in kinkajous. Other animals such as coatis may be susceptible. When wild animals are kept as pets, there can be a risk of disease transmission to humans.",CDC,Parasites - Baylisascaris infection
What is (are) Yellow Fever Vaccination ?,"If you continue to live or travel in yellow fever-endemic areas, you should receive a booster dose of yellow fever vaccine
